name: Notion Decision Journal Template
description: Two Notion database templates of decisions modeled after the Farnam Street Decision Journal to help you and your team make better decisions.How To Use ItOnce you receive a link over email, open it and click "Duplicate" on the top right to copy this page to your Notion workspace. Read about itA blog post about this template was published on the Digital Opssessions newsletter. There's also a video breakdown.
